attributes.action: Pay me my 7 years pension from 1963 to 1970
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am an ex Cpl Royal Marines and served from 5.2.1963 to 11.5.1970. I have in my possession a document that states that I have 7yrs and 103 days towards my pension.I have not received a penny as yet.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the DWP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
